color.div:
Benigumas are small fox-like creatures residing in the
1st Layer. They are usually only found during the day, as this is when they hunt for prey before returning to their den.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: The main food source of Benigumas are the Fuwagis and Sweet Berries. They are not hostile towards Delvers and will try to flee when one approaches. One can however tempt them with said berries and get them closer.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: They do not seem to have much of value. The only usable part of their body is the parts of
Fuwagis and
Sweet Berries that can be found in their stomachs.
:hypers:
